frases.f1: I usually drink coffee in the morning
frases.f2: They are studying for the math test
frases.f3: My brother works at the hospital
frases.f4: We travelled to Canada last year
frases.f5: She bought a new cellphone yesterday

alternativas: I usually drink coffee in the morning
I usually drink tea in the morning
I always drink water in the morning
questoes.resposta_correta: I usually drink coffee in the morning

alternativas: They are studying for the math test
They are studying for the English test
They are studying history at school
questoes.resposta_correta: They are studying for the math test
questoes.explicacao: A frase fala sobre estudar para prova de matemática.

alternativas: My brother works at the hospital
My brother works at the supermarket
My brother studies at the university
questoes.resposta_correta: My brother works at the hospital
questoes.explicacao: A correta é o local hospital.

alternativas: We travelled to Canada last year
We travelled to Mexico last year
We travelled to Europe last year
questoes.resposta_correta: We travelled to Canada last year

alternativas: She bought a new cellphone yesterday
She found an old cellphone yesterday
questoes.resposta_correta: She bought a new cellphone yesterday
questoes.explicacao: A resposta correta indica que ela comprou.
